author: vors
body:
- Run FullCLR sanitary tests in AppVeyor

This change brings a very minimal set of tests and make
build fail, if we cannot load some PS assamblies on FullCLR
- We should increase test coverage for FullCLR in future.
- Include msvcr120.dll runtime to powershell.exe

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body:
Fantastic work. I grabbed the zip of the Full PowerShell artifacts from AppVeyor, imported the DevPS module, and had _our_ PowerShell open and running. Approved.

By the way, the majority of our Pester tests that fail on Windows are due to an "Invalid handle" error, if we can fix the root of that, we'll be down to just a few failures.

title: Enable full CLR sanitary tests
